    Based on three.js code

      • unprojectVector

      • pickingRay

        public Ray pickingRay(Vector3 vector,
             Camera camera)
        Translates a 2D point from NDC (Normalized Device Coordinates) to a Ray that can be used for picking.

        NDC range from [-1..1] in x (left to right) and [1.0 .. -1.0] in y (top to bottom).
